tasks.task: Buying a drip system for watering plants.
subtasks: Adding a drip system to cart.
Completing the purchase of the drip system.
Reading the instructions that come with the drip system.
Measuring the area where the plants are located.
Determining the appropriate placement of emitters and lines for the drip system.
Digging trenches for the drip lines.
Connecting the emitters to the main water supply.
Testing the drip system for leaks or proper functioning.
Adjusting the system settings as needed for the plants' needs.

tasks.task: Watering plants using a drip system instead of manual watering.
subtasks: Refilling the water reservoir of the drip system regularly.
Checking the drip lines for any blockages or damage.
Observing plants for signs of over or under watering and adjusting the system accordingly.
